Submit a registered email address.
Verify password recovery email trigger confirmation is displayed.

title: Password Recovery with Unregistered Email
description: Check system does not reveal if email is unregistered and handles input securely.

steps.description: Navigate to the forgot password page.
Submit an unregistered email address.
Verify system behaves consistently and does not disclose email unregistration.

title: Add and Validate Financial Entry Input Fields

title: Health Module - Input Validation
description: Check form validation for medication and appointment entries with invalid or missing data.

title: Hotmart Webhook Integration - Valid Payment Event Handling
description: Validate the webhook accepts legitimate Hotmart payment events and updates user payment status.

steps.description: Send a Hotmart webhook event with a valid HMAC signature for a successful payment.
Confirm the payment event is accepted, authenticated, and the user payment status updates accordingly.

title: Hotmart Webhook - Invalid HMAC Signature
description: Ensure webhook rejects payment events with invalid or tampered HMAC signatures.

steps.description: Send a Hotmart webhook event with an incorrect or missing HMAC signature.
Verify the webhook rejects the event and does not process payment updates.

title: Authentication Security - JWT Token Validation and Expiry
description: Check that JWT tokens are valid, correctly signed, and expire after set time.

steps.description: Log in to obtain JWT token.
Verify the token is properly signed and contains required claims.
Attempt to access protected endpoints with expired token.
Confirm access is denied and user is prompted to re-authenticate.

title: Security Headers Verification
description: Validate that Content Security Policy (CSP), HSTS, CORS, and other security headers are present on all pages.

steps.description: Access multiple pages including landing, login, dashboard and API endpoints.
Verify response headers include CSP, HSTS, CORS whitelisting, and other security headers.

title: Rate Limiting Enforcement
description: Check the application blocks excessive or abusive requests for login or API endpoints to prevent brute force attacks.

steps.description: Send repeated authentication or API requests exceeding configured thresholds.
Verify the system throttles or blocks the requests and returns appropriate error messages.

title: CORS Policy Restriction
description: Verify API endpoints only accept requests from whitelisted origins.

steps.description: Attempt API calls from allowed origins.
Confirm request is accepted.
Attempt API calls from disallowed origins.
Confirm requests are rejected via CORS policy enforcement.

title: Logging Functionality Check
description: Ensure that Winston logging captures info, warning, and error levels appropriately during operations.

steps.description: Perform actions that trigger info logs such as user login and data update.
Verify info logs are recorded with correct messages.
Trigger warning and error conditions like invalid input or server errors.
Check warning and error logs contain relevant details for auditing.

title: Landing Page Responsiveness and Accessibility
description: Verify landing page renders correctly and is accessible across supported devices and browsers.

steps.description: Open landing page in multiple browsers and devices.
Ensure layout adjusts properly and UI components meet accessibility standards.

title: Environment Variables Configuration
description: Check that the application loads all required environment variables correctly and handles missing or invalid configurations.

steps.description: Start the app with correct environment variables.
Verify all external API integrations and services function without errors.
Restart the app with missing or malformed environment variables.
Confirm the application reports configuration errors and does not start improperly.
